definition: to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown

sentences.english: The problem is that whenever antimatter comes into contact with regular matter, the two annihilate.
sentences.chinese: 反物質一旦接觸到普通物質，兩者即會同時湮滅。

sentences.english: Records of Zheng He's incredible voyages were burned.
sentences.chinese: 鄭和令人驚歎的航海紀錄也遭焚燬湮滅。

sentences.english: Should know that the strong can annihilate Seamless in the years to come.
sentences.chinese: 要知道，在強也能湮滅在歲月無痕中。

sentences.english: Will the mutual annihilation and conversion to pure energy destroy the world?
sentences.chinese: 它們的相互湮滅會轉化爲純粹的能量而毀滅世界嗎？

sentences.english: The tide will take, the sea will rise and time will rape.
sentences.chinese: 潮欲漲，浪更狂，整個時空即將就此湮滅。

sentences.english: And so, again, this thing will run out of gas.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的話原子將會湮滅。

sentences.english: A method for constructing orthonormalized eigenstates of annihilation operator b 3 - of a non harmonic is presented.
sentences.chinese: 構造了非簡諧振子湮滅算符3次冪的正交歸一本徵態。

sentences.english: It will look for evidence of dark matter "annihilations" in space.
sentences.chinese: 它將尋找暗物質在太空“湮滅”的證據。

sentences.english: The view of the top of the Eiffel Tower was obscured by the inclement weather.
sentences.chinese: 艾菲爾鐵塔的塔尖已經湮滅在了惡劣的下雪天中。

sentences.english: Some say, "Love, it is a razor that leaves your soul to bleed."
sentences.chinese: 有人說愛是一條河，能將柔軟的葦杆湮滅。

sentences.english: In the petrifying abyss of Time.
sentences.chinese: 皆湮滅在時間日益僵滯的深淵中。

definition: to restore old way/to return to the past
lit. scattered ashes and dispersed smoke (idiom)/fig. to be annihilated/to vanish in a puff of smoke
(of time) to pass quickly/to be fleeting
lit. the Big Dipper 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1] has turned and the stars have moved/time flies/also written 星移斗轉|星移斗转[xing1 yi2 Dou3 zhuan3]
